meanings.sent1: The nonfat yogurt is a healthier option for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: I prefer nonfat milk in my coffee.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her nonfat salad dressing was so light, it might float away!
meanings.sent4: The nonfat clouds in the sky looked like fluffy pillows.
meanings.sent5: The nonfat label on the packaging caught my eye immediately.

meanings.sent1: The doctor recommended a nonfat diet for better health.
meanings.sent2: I bought nonfat cheese for my sandwich.
meanings.sent3: He proudly showed off his nonfat physique at the beach.
meanings.sent4: The nonfat tire on his bike made it easier to pedal uphill.
meanings.sent5: The nonfat content of the food was clearly marked on the menu.
